: : SharpClaw : :
The jaguar bot looks at his new commander.
SharpClaw: I am SharpClaw, and my skill...
He starts to fiddle with his gun.
SharpClaw: Is making sure Maximals leave battles without their heads.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Hydras:

Hydras narrowed his eyes and hissed "I hope that you dodn't 
dissapoint me... Sandstorm..."

"And you? What can you said for Your self?" Looking to Sharpcraws 
and Kitkat


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> Sandstorm transforms to a robot. Both of Sandstorm's claws, now 
his hands snap open. In the left, a pair of missiles are docked. In 
the right, a cyber-bee is docked. His tail, now mounted on his back, 
begins to glow as energy is charged into it.
> 
> Sandstorm: That'll speak for itself.
> 
> Sandstorm's official stats:
> 
> Strength: 8.0
> Intelligence: 9.0
> Speed: 6.0
> Endurance: 8.0
> Rank: 10.0
> Courage: 9.0
> Firepower: 7.0
> Skill: 9.0
> 
> Sandstorm: I was a Maximal Commander on Cybertron, and was pretty 
respected. I hope I will please the Predacon cause as much as I 
pleased the Maximals.
> 
> His weapons disarm and he bows.
> 
> Sandstorm: Master Hydras, I swear allegiance to the Predacon 
Army...
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: airly2000 <airly2002@h...>
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Wednesday, February 26, 2003 12:02 AM
>   Subject: Hydras/Sandstorm
> 
> 
>   Hydras:
> 
>   "I'm Hydras... You leader. Now, Sandstorm, tell me your skills"
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
>   <hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
>   > OOC: If I make any mistakes in this post, I'm sorry, but I'm 
just 
>   very confused right now and think I missed a reply somewhere.
>   > 
>   > BIC:
>   > 
>   > The two pods cracked open. The one that was brought back to 
the 
>   Predacon base is focused on. A set of legs came out of the side. 
>   Arachnid legs. A set of arachnid legs then came out of the other 
>   side. A long tail rose, and then two claws emerged. The giant 
>   scorpion pulled itself from the pod and stood on the edges. It 
was 
>   gray with orange claws.
>   > 
>   > Sandstorm: Greetings, my name is Sandstorm. Identify 
yourself...
